text: Ken Rosewall and Fred Stolle were the defending US Open men's doubles tennis champions but lost their title after a defeat in the semifinals. Eighth-seeded Pierre Barthès and Nikola Pilić won the title by defeating sixth-seeded Roy Emerson and Rod Laver 6–3, 7–6, 4–6, 7–6 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom Half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== ==External links== * Association of Tennis professionals (ATP) results archive *1970 US Open – Men's draws and results at the International Tennis Federation Men's Doubles Category:US Open (tennis) by year – Men's Doubles
title: 1970 US Open – Men's Doubles
